p: In summary, the lipidomic profiles of three HPS mutant mice ( pa ( HPS9 −/−), ru ( HPS6 −/−), and ep ( HPS1 −/−)) showed that Cer and DAG were reduced in pa and ru mice, compared with WT mice, while TAG (containing DHA) was increased. In contrast, PA, LPS, TAG, SM, and Cho were elevated in ep mice compared with WT mice ( Table 2).
